name: torrent-aio-bot-rclone-mod
description: All in one bot for torrenting

AUTH_CODE.description: Drive Auth Code is needed to access in Drive. Need To Generate. go to "http://torrent-aio-bot.herokuapp.com/drivehelp" for Generate.

CLIENT_ID.description: Drive Auth Code is needed to access in Drive. Need To Generate. go to "https://developers.google.com/drive/api/v3/quickstart/nodejs" for Generate.

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Drive Auth Code is needed to access in Drive. Need To Generate. go to "https://developers.google.com/drive/api/v3/quickstart/nodejs" for Generate.

GDRIVE_PARENT_FOLDER.description: Folder Id of Google. Read Readme.md to know more.

TELEGRAM_TOKEN.description: enviorment variable with key TELEGRAM_TOKEN and token of your bot as value.

TOKEN.description: Drive Auth Code is needed to access in Drive. Need To Generate. go to "http://torrent-aio-bot.herokuapp.com/drivehelp" for Generate

SEARCH_SITE.description: Change APPNAME to your heroku app name set first

SITE.description: Change APPNAME to your heroku app name set first

DISABLE_WEB.description: If you only want telegram bot to be working, set value of DISABLE_WEB env var to true, else leave it BLANK.

RCLONE_CONFIG.description: Rclone config to mount in one line, replace line breaks with "\n"

RCLONE_DESTINATION.description: Rclone destination path, format "[drivename A]:[remove path A]
